criteria: Accurately identifies and differentiates between the North and South Poles.
Accurately identifies and differentiates between the equator and the prime meridian.
Accurately identifies and describes the tropics (Tropic of Cancer and Tropic of Capricorn).
Accurately identifies and describes the hemispheres (Northern, Southern, Eastern, and Western).
Uses coordinates (latitude and longitude) to accurately plot locations on a map or globe.
descriptions: Does not identify or incorrectly identifies the North and South Poles.
Identifies the North and South Poles but struggles to differentiate them.
Identifies the North and South Poles and provides a basic differentiation.
Clearly identifies the North and South Poles and accurately differentiates them with some detail.
Clearly and accurately identifies and differentiates the North and South Poles with a thorough explanation.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the North and South Poles, accurately differentiating them and explaining their significance in geographical context.
Does not identify or incorrectly identifies the equator and the prime meridian.
Identifies the equator and the prime meridian but struggles to differentiate them.
Identifies the equator and the prime meridian and provides a basic differentiation.
Clearly identifies the equator and the prime meridian and accurately differentiates them with some detail.
Clearly and accurately identifies and differentiates the equator and the prime meridian with a thorough explanation.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the equator and the prime meridian, accurately differentiating them and explaining their significance in geographical context.
Does not identify or incorrectly identifies the tropics.
Identifies the tropics but provides an inaccurate or incomplete description.
Identifies the tropics and provides a basic description.
Clearly identifies the tropics and provides an accurate description with some detail.
Clearly and accurately identifies the tropics with a thorough description and explanation of their climatic significance.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the tropics, accurately describing them and explaining their impact on global climate patterns.
Does not identify or incorrectly identifies the hemispheres.
Identifies the hemispheres but provides an inaccurate or incomplete description.
Identifies the hemispheres and provides a basic description.
Clearly identifies the hemispheres and provides an accurate description with some detail.
Clearly and accurately identifies the hemispheres with a thorough description and provides relevant examples of countries/regions located in each.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the hemispheres, accurately describing them and explaining their impact on global cultures and economies.
Unable to use coordinates to plot locations or plots locations incorrectly.
Attempts to use coordinates but struggles to accurately plot locations.
Uses coordinates to plot locations with limited accuracy.
Accurately uses coordinates to plot locations with minor errors.
Accurately uses coordinates to plot locations with precision.
Demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of coordinate systems, accurately plotting locations and explaining the relationship between latitude, longitude, and geographic positioning.
